Move

if(wearID == 7927){
int randomEgg = misc.random(5)+1;
if(randomEgg == 1){
       npcId = 3689;
       turnIntoEgg();
}
if(randomEgg == 2){
       npcId == ####;
       turnIntoEgg();
}

under this

item.title: [Delta]Randomizing Isnpc Items
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Add this

public void turnIntoEgg(){ npcId2 = npcId; isNpc = true; specGFX(160); }
And then use this.
The misc.random(5)+1, you may change the 5 to how ever many eggs there are.

if(wearID == 7927){
int randomEgg = misc.random(5)+1;
if(randomEgg == 1){
       npcId = 3689;
       turnIntoEgg();
}
if(randomEgg == 2){
       npcId == ####;
       turnIntoEgg();
}
...

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Randomizing Isnpc Items
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

I’ve been attempting to add in a functioning Easter ring with randomized eggs, abd I have been able to transform into a single type of egg, but I can’t find a way to get them to randomize.
My current code is:

if(wearID == 7927){ npcId = 3689; npcId2 = npcId; isNpc = true; specGFX(160);

If you could help and/or explain I would really appreciate it.

Read full topic
